import React, {Component} from 'react' import { API_BASE } from '../constants'; import { Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' class Room extends Component { render() { const { humidity, light, name, pet_access, room_plants, temp_F } = this.props.room return ( {name} {light} Light Exposure
(5 - Direct Sunlight : 1 - Shaded)
{temp_F}Â°F Temperature
{humidity}% Humidity
{pet_access ? "" : "No"} Pets Allowed ) } } export default Room
